summary: REQ-12 is partially addressed via a new Node preflight script and runtime diagnostics, but there is no evidence it is integrated into the build/deploy pipeline. REQ-11 is not met: the diff adds browser-console diagnostics rather than capturing full build/deploy logs in the platform build output, and there are no shown minimal config fixes (e.g., dfx.json/vite/canister config) to ensure a clean deploy succeeds. Several added UI/branding changes appear outside the stated scope and non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify the root cause of the previous Internet Computer deployment failure ("Unable to complete deployment") by capturing the full build/deploy logs and making the minimal code/config changes needed so a clean deploy succeeds.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows added frontend runtime console logging/error boundary, but no evidence of capturing full build/deploy logs in build output (CI/platform) and no evidence of actual deployment configuration fixes (e.g., dfx.json/canister build config) that would make a clean deploy succeed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a lightweight preflight validation step to the project build that checks for required Internet Computer project files/configuration and fails with clear English messages when prerequisites are missing or inconsistent.
missing_requirements.reason: A preflight script is added, but the diff does not show it being invoked by the project build/deploy (no package.json/scripts, CI config, or deploy command wiring shown). Without integration, it is not a build 'step' that fails early.

hallucinated_features.description: Major new/changed application UI content and branding (e.g., "Rubina Assistant" header, welcome card content describing multilingual assistant with voice capabilities, connected status UI).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly forbid adding new assistant features or changing visual theme/branding assets; these UI additions go beyond minimal build/deploy correctness and diagnostics.

hallucinated_features.description: Runtime "preflight" implemented as a backend method that always traps with a message about language limitations.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 asks for a build-time preflight validation step for required project files/config; adding a backend API that traps is not requested and does not satisfy the build-time prerequisite validation goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Added React Query hook to run runtime preflight checks (session-level) unrelated to build-time validation.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 is about build preflight validation; adding runtime preflight hooks is extra behavior not requested and risks expanding scope beyond deployment correctness.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a deployment error boundary with custom inline-styled fallback UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: While diagnostics can be relevant, the requirement focuses on build/deploy logs in build output and minimal changes; adding new fallback UI/styling is not explicitly requested and may be considered scope creep.
